casebody.data:
NOONSAB
v.
STATE of NC 131P16-10 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 20, 2018 Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Somchai Noonsab, for Noonsab, Somchai. Somchoi Noorsob, for Noorsob, Somchoi. N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th of July 2018 by Defendant for Constitutional Questions:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of September 2018."
